content:
Management

  • To early to tell. If we knew what they would be we could fix them now.

  • Some possibilities:

    • Namespace specific knowledge allows for special casing certain URNs which affects interoperability
    • What happens if we a namespace becomes so popular that it ìtakes overî the URN space? (I.e. the .com phenomenon happens to URNs)
